value:
$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|Brother...you look...nice. Very
handsome.$k$p$WmMPID_リュシオン,ch11_07_Rieusion_M_Normal,Face|It's true. You cut a striking figure.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ラフィエル,ch11_17_Raphael_M_Wedding20,Face|Thank you. Now that I think about
it, you two didn't see my wedding
to the queen...$k$pI'm glad, then, that you can see
me now!$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|Where...is she?$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ラフィエル,ch11_17_Raphael_M_Wedding20,Face|Hm. She's taking quite some time to
prepare, isn't she? Or rather...$k$pI imagine her attendants are taking
some time to assure her that her
preparations are sufficient.$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|So excited... Wish for...pretty
dress too.$k$p$WmMPID_リュシオン,ch11_07_Rieusion_M_Normal,Face|You too, hm? ...Hmph.$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|No good?$k$p$WmMPID_リュシオン,ch11_07_Rieusion_M_Normal,Face|Well...it's just, wearing bridal dress
has certain implications...$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ラフィエル,ch11_17_Raphael_M_Wedding20,Face|Heh. Come now, Leanne, don't force
Reyson into an awkward situation.$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch11_08_Learne_F_Normal,Face|Hm?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_花嫁オボロ,ch05_06_Oboro_F_Wedding20,Face|Hold it, Hinata! ...WAIT, I said!$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ヒナタ,ch05_03_Hinata_M_Wedding20,Face|Ah, shut it! You've been yappin'
away at me all morning. Gimme
a break already!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁オボロ,ch05_06_Oboro_F_Wedding20,Face|Your collar is still all wrong! And
a kimono must be worn properly
or not at all!$k$pI will not allow this assault on my
sense of aesthetics to continue!
So...HOLD STILL!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁オボロ,ch05_06_Oboro_F_Wedding20,Face|Gotcha! Now, time to get you all
straightened out. Come with me.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ヒナタ,ch05_03_Hinata_M_Wedding20,Face|...Whoa! Is that Lord Takumi?!
What's HE doing here?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁オボロ,ch05_06_Oboro_F_Wedding20,Face|Wh-where?!$k$pOh no, oh no... I haven't looked in
a mirror since the last battle. I can't
let him see me like this!$k$p...Wait. Where is Takumi, exactly?$k$pOh, of course. He ran away when
I wasn't looking.$k$p$Sbs150|
